briefdescription.para: Vertex shaders with extra defines from the renderpath.
Pixel shaders with extra defines from the renderpath.

detaileddescription.para: Set culling mode override. By default culling mode is read from the material instead. Set the illegal culling mode MAX_CULLMODES to disable override again. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set pass lighting mode, affects what shader variations will be attempted to be loaded. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether requires desktop level hardware. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_desktop
Set vertex shader defines. Separate multiple defines with spaces. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set pixel shader defines. Separate multiple defines with spaces. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set vertex shader define excludes. Use to mark defines that the shader code will not recognize, to prevent compiling redundant shader variations. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set pixel shader define excludes. Use to mark defines that the shader code will not recognize, to prevent compiling redundant shader variations. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return pass index. This is used for optimal render-time pass queries that avoid map lookups.

detaileddescription.para: Return culling mode override. If pass is not overriding culling mode (default), the illegal mode MAX_CULLMODES is returned. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return last shaders loaded frame number.

detaileddescription.para: Return whether requires desktop level hardware. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return vertex shader define excludes. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return pixel shader define excludes. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return vertex shaders with extra defines from the renderpath.
Return pixel shaders with extra defines from the renderpath.
Return the effective vertex shader defines, accounting for excludes. Called internally by Renderer.
Return the effective pixel shader defines, accounting for excludes. Called internally by Renderer.
Material rendering pass, which defines shaders and render state.
